comment.author: 51035594858@N01
comment._content:
From ancestry.com:
Edwin Chamberlain
Residence: Bath, New Hampshire
Enlistment Date: 11 Aug 1862
Side Served: Union
State Served: New Hampshire
Service Record: Enlisted as a Corporal on 11 August 1862 at the age of 18.
Enlisted in Company G, 11th Infantry Regiment New Hampshire on 2 Sep 1862.
Died of disease Company G, 11th Infantry Regiment New Hampshire on 23 Jan 1864 at Camp Nelson, KY.
Sources: 12
